title: The Color of Wounds: A Kent Stephenson Thriller (3)
description: In THE COLOR OF WOUNDS, book #3 in the series, been years since Kent helped an old classmate expose inhumane animal testing at the research center of a prominent university. But now, after all that time, his good intentions are coming back to haunt him. Ex-members of the US military-industrial complex have Kent in their crosshairs. When threats and blackmail don't stop him, they bring on the bombs.
author: Frank Martorana
